title: The Bible KNEECAP Free Preview
itunes:title: The Bible KNEECAP Free Preview
description:
This bonus episode is a sample of our daily prayer podcast called, The Bible Kneecap. This podcast is available exclusively to certain members of our Patreon Family!

If you like what you hear, join our Patreon family at the $10/month (The Bible Kneecap tier) or any higher tier to pray with us as we read through the New Testament.
